info.name: ListAll - Not Applicable
info.description: This file is only required for routing/navigation apps. ListAll is a list management app and does not provide routing or navigation services. This file is included as a placeholder for documentation purposes only.

comment: ROUTING APP COVERAGE FILE - NOT NEEDED FOR ListAll
why_not_needed: ListAll is not a routing or navigation app
ListAll does not provide turn-by-turn directions
ListAll does not display maps or routes
This file is only required for apps that offer routing services
You do NOT need to submit this file to App Store Connect for ListAll

app_types: Food delivery apps with driver routing
what_it_contains: Geographic coverage area where routing works
Required if app provides routing outside of Apple Maps

conclusion: You can safely ignore or delete this file. It is not needed for ListAll's App Store submission.
